welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Cooper City, known for its friendly community and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and international flights for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights for major airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at North Perry Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Opa Locka Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves a variety of domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport is the largest and busiest terminal, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport primarily serves international airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport handles all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
